quoteText: You acknowledge that Crowdmark uses third party service providers and hosting partners to provide the necessary hardware, software, networking, storage, and related technology required to run the Services, including third parties to permit the uploading and submission of Content to the Services and to process payments, if any.
title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr: Their Terms of Service state: "You acknowledge that Crowdmark uses third party service providers and hosting partners to provide the necessary hardware, software, networking, storage, and related technology required to run the Services, including third parties to permit the uploading and submission of Content to the Services and to process payments, if any." They also use third party payment processors.
